    • Constructor Detail

      • FileMenu

        public FileMenu(int y,
                int x,
                int Size,
                int Columns,
                int Padding)

        Initialise buffer and set default style variables

        Parameters:
        y - height of buffer
        x - width of buffer
        Size - Thumbnail size in file menu
        Columns - Number of columns in file menu
        Padding - Padding around certain items in the menu

    • Method Detail

      • returnMenuPosition

        public int returnMenuPosition()
        Returns:
        int value of the menuPosition

      • navigateMenu

        public void navigateMenu(java.lang.String input,
                         int listLength)

        Method for navigating menu

        Parameters:
        input - User input to be processed
        listLength - Number of files contained within the displayed directory

      • paintView

        public void paintView(java.lang.String directory)

        Method for painting the menu into the fileMenu screen buffer

        Parameters:
        directory - Directory containing the saved files to be displayed

      • makeScrollbar

        public java.lang.String makeScrollbar(int length,
                                      int limit,
                                      char handle,
                                      char bar)

        Method for creating a scrollbar representing the selected position's relative position in the file list

        Parameters:
        length - Horizontal length of the scroll bar to be made
        limit - The length of the file list
        handle - The character to represent the current position in the file list
        bar - The character to represent the rest of the scroll bar
        Returns:
        String containing the scrollbar formatted with supplied parameters

      • makeItem

        public char[][] makeItem(int fileNumber,
                         java.lang.String file,
                         char background)

        Create file item to write in menu.

        Item consists of file thumbnail, name and size information

        Parameters:
        fileNumber - the 0-indexed position of the file in the file list
        file - Pathname of the file that is to be read
        background - Character for the item
        Returns:
        2 Dimensional char array containing the generated thumbnail for the file and the file name and size

      • makeThumbnail

        public char[][] makeThumbnail(java.lang.String file,
                              int size)

        Create thumbnail for a given file

        Parameters:
        file - Pathname of the file that is to be thumbnailed
        size - The height and width of the thumbnail
        Returns:
        2 Dimensional char array containing the generated thumbnail for the file at pathname 'file'

      • frequentCharacter

        public char frequentCharacter(char[] array)

        Find the most frequent character in an array of charaters

        Parameters:
        array - Array to be searched for the most frequent character
        Returns:
        Character that appears most frequently in a char array
